teiCorpus:
Softcite annotated corpus
Principal Investigator James Howison
curator James Howison, Cai Fan Du, Patrice Lopez
The Softcite dataset is a gold standard corpus of manually annotated software mentions from academic PDFs. This corpus file contains one TEI entry per scholar publication having at least one software mention. Each paragraph containing at least one manually annotated software mentions is encoded under the TEI body element.
Howison Lab, University of Texas at Austin, School of Information
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
Softcite corpus, version 0.0.0, 2020
A machine learning software for extracting information from scholarly documents
A GROBID module to recognize in textual documents and PDF any mentions of software
Document originally analyzed by one annotator
Document originally analyzed by more than one annotator
Document analyzed by one or more annotators with review by the curator team
Document analyzed by one or more annotators with review by the curator team, combined with additional corrections driven by automated consistency checks
